entry.title: Vegetarian pasta
entry.content:
Vegetarian pasta

Italian cuisine is always very romantic. You will surprise your mate with this unique and easy recipe. Suitable for vegetarians and spaghetti lovers. This will be one of the best food you ever try.

entry.title: Banana cake
entry.content:
Banana cake

Cake is easy to prepare and always gets good. We have reduced the amount of sugar in it to make it healthier and replace it with honey.

entry.title: Musaka
entry.content:
Musaka

Muscat is a typical Bulgarian dish. Here we have tried to keep up with the traditions of our grandmothers. When you consume it you will remember the aromas of your mother kitchen.

entry.title: Roasted mushrooms

Roasted mushrooms

entry.title: Skebe corba
entry.content:
Skebe corba

The dish is asian and combines the tastes of Mediterranean food and the most used Eastern spices. Prepare for 20 minutes and will fascinate you with its Asian flavor.

entry.title: Tomato soup

Tomato soup

This soup is suitable for hot summer days, so it can be consumed cold. The variety of tomatoes in the recipe can be replaced by your choice.
